titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress regarding the primary author and the official "Home of Yankee Doodle".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 4/28/1993--Introduced. Recognizes Dr. Richard Shuckburgh as the primary author of the tune "Yankee Doodle" and Fort Crailo in Rensselaer, New York, as the official "Home of Yankee Doodle."
